channel.title: CVE Feed for ZoneMinder -- zoneminder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ZoneMinder -- zoneminder

item.title: CVE-2024-43358|2024-08-14T13:40:05.699Z -- zoneminder -- zoneminder
item.description: ZoneMinder is a free, open source closed-circuit television software application. ZoneMinder has a cross-site scripting vulnerability in the filter view via the filter[Id]. This vulnerability is fixed in 1.36.34 and 1.37.61.

item.title: CVE-2024-43360|2024-08-12T20:55:14.760Z -- zoneminder -- zoneminder
item.description: ZoneMinder is a free, open source closed-circuit television software application. ZoneMinder is affected by a time-based SQL Injection vulnerability. This vulnerability is fixed in 1.36.34 and 1.37.61.

item.title: CVE-2024-43359|2024-08-12T20:49:28.130Z -- zoneminder -- zoneminder
item.description: ZoneMinder is a free, open source closed-circuit television software application. ZoneMinder has a cross-site scripting vulnerability in the montagereview via the displayinterval, speed, and scale parameters. This vulnerability is fixed in 1.36.34 and 1.37.61.

item.title: CVE-2024-43358|2024-08-12T20:46:59.082Z -- zoneminder -- zoneminder
item.description: ZoneMinder is a free, open source closed-circuit television software application. ZoneMinder has a cross-site scripting vulnerability in the filter view via the filter[Id]. This vulnerability is fixed in 1.36.34 and 1.37.61.

item.title: CVE-2023-41884|2024-08-12T19:39:34.575Z -- zoneminder -- zoneminder
item.description: ZoneMinder is a free, open source Closed-circuit television software application. In WWW/AJAX/watch.php, Line: 51 takes a few parameter in sql query without sanitizing it which makes it vulnerable to sql injection. This vulnerability is fixed in 1.36.34.

item.title: CVE-2024-43359|2024-08-13T17:05:24.009Z -- zoneminder -- zoneminder
item.description: ZoneMinder is a free, open source closed-circuit television software application. ZoneMinder has a cross-site scripting vulnerability in the montagereview via the displayinterval, speed, and scale parameters. This vulnerability is fixed in 1.36.34 and 1.37.61.

item.title: CVE-2023-41884|2024-08-13T17:34:56.389Z -- zoneminder -- zoneminder
item.description: ZoneMinder is a free, open source Closed-circuit television software application. In WWW/AJAX/watch.php, Line: 51 takes a few parameter in sql query without sanitizing it which makes it vulnerable to sql injection. This vulnerability is fixed in 1.36.34.
